page.title: 14RECREATION IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: {RECREATION AT WOODHALL SPA Woodhall Spa provided the perfect centre for recreation of all nature lovers,sports enthusiasts or historians.There are numerous nature trails,a butterfly reserve,forestry walks and the{Viking Way.}There are several superb hotels,pleasant guest houses and many caravan sites.Caravans can be sited by the river,at Jubilee Park, at Bainland Park at Roughton.At{ {Jubilee Park}are a heated swimming pool,playground,bowls,tennis cricket & football pitches.The golf course attracts thousands;water sports and horse riding are within easy reach. Scouts and Cubs have an excellent site for weekends & holidays.The community centre provides for young & old,youth club,discos,bingo,whist drives and carpet bowls.The unique{Kinema in the {Woods }gives film entertainment.
